titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 1258), entitled "A bill for the relief of Sarabeth M. Davis, Robert S. Borders, Victor Maron, Irving Berke, and Adele E. Conrad", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 107-444.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 4.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/7/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Refers H.R. 1258 (private relief) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report.
